SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.nnsoft.shs.http
Interface Session

public interface Session

Represents an HTTP user session, inspired by the HttpSession

Method Summary
<A> A
getAttribute(String name)
          Returns the object bound with the specified name in this session, or null if no object is bound under the name.
 Date getCreationTime()
          Returns the time when this session was created.
 UUID getId()
          Returns the unique identifier assigned to this session.
 Date getLastAccessedTime()
          Returns the last time the client sent a request associated with this session.
 boolean isNew()
          Marks the session is a new session or already existing one.
 void removeAttribute(String name)
          Removes the object bound with the specified name from this session.
<A> void
setAttribute(String name, A value)
          Binds an object to this session, using the name specified.
 

Method Detail

getId

UUID getId()
Returns the unique identifier assigned to this session.

Returns:
the unique identifier assigned to this session

getAttribute

<A> A getAttribute(String name)
Returns the object bound with the specified name in this session, or null if no object is bound under the name.

Parameters:
name - a string specifying the name of the object
Returns:
the object bound with the specified name in this session, or null if no object is bound under the name.

removeAttribute

void removeAttribute(String name)
Removes the object bound with the specified name from this session.

Parameters:
name - the name of the object to remove from this session

setAttribute

<A> void setAttribute(String name,
                      A value)
Binds an object to this session, using the name specified.

Parameters:
name - the non-null name to which the object is bound
value - the object to be bound

getCreationTime

Date getCreationTime()
Returns the time when this session was created.

Returns:
the time when this session was created.

getLastAccessedTime

Date getLastAccessedTime()
Returns the last time the client sent a request associated with this session.

Returns:
the last time the client sent a request associated with this session.

isNew

boolean isNew()
Marks the session is a new session or already existing one.

Returns:
true if the client does not yet know about the session or if the client chooses not to join the session.
